# quantiles

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of quantiles is to provide the specific quantiles of a numeric vector.

## Installation

You can install the released version of quantiles using the devtools package with:

``` r
# install.packages(devtools)
devtools::install_github("jvhuynh11/quantiles")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(quantiles)
tertile(1:100)
```
